TopicTitle: [FAR n Firespitter] WF-2P1: Stable, yet Maneuverable and somehow Fast.

Articles.Content:
I have a craft to present you.

Behold, the **WF-2P1**!

![gLa0nmX.png](http://i.imgur.com/gLa0nmX.png)

http://imgur.com/a/HMiZG

**ALBUM HERE**

The unique wing shape allows the aircraft to be both stable and maneuverable.

Its powerful engine can take the craft to Mach 0.9 ASL.

-x-

ACTION GROUPS:

A1: ENGINE ON

.A2: ENGINE OFF

.......A3: TOGGLE LADDER

............................A0: TOGGLE FRONT GEAR STEERING

-x-
